project.model.account_config

class project.model.account_config.AccountConfig(config: ConfigParser, section: str)[source]

Bases: object

AccountConfig manages account-specific configuration settings.

config

The configuration parser instance.

Type:

configparser.ConfigParser

section

The section in the configuration file containing account settings.

Type:

str
